thread.title: BRIEF-Xiwang Special Steel Clarifies On U.S. Steel Import Tariffs

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Xiwang Special Steel Clarifies On U.S. Steel Import Tariffs

organizations.name: brief-xiwang special steel clarifies on u.s. steel import tariffs march
reuters) - xiwang special steel co ltd

text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Xiwang Special Steel Co Ltd:
* REFERS TO MEDIA REPORTING THAT GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES WILL INCREASE IMPORT TARIFFS ON STEEL
* CLARIFIES THAT FINANCIAL CONDITION OF COMPANY IS NOT EXPECTED TO BE ADVERSELY AFFECTED
* CO HAS NO IMMEDIATE PLAN TO EXPORT STEELS TO UNITED STATES IN NEAR FUTUREâ€‹ Source text ( bit.ly/2H4ETqg ) Further company coverage:
